titleStmt.title: A sermon of spirituall life and death Preached before the king, at White-Hal, Nouember, 1616 by the late faithfull minister of Iesus Christ, Iohn Preston, Dr. In Diuinity, chapplaine in ordinar[y] to his maiesty, Mr. of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher at Lincolnes Inne.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. C[otes] for Michael Sparke, dwelling at the signe of the Blue Bible in Greene Arbor,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, the title is within a compartment.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Blue Bible in Greene Arbor
